About Me

BIO

Currently working as an Application developer with hands-on experience in creating and maintaining Microservice Architecture based applications with full stack coverage.
And also an experienced Research Assistant and Teaching Assistant with a demonstrated history of working in the higher education industry.
Skilled in Java, GoLang, JavaScript, MySQL, NoSQL Databases, React.js, Node.js, AWS, GIT.
Strong Quality assurance professional with a Master's Degree focused in Computer Science and Information Systems from Cleveland State University with a GPA of 3.82.
I believe in learning and I'm very enthusiastic in learning new technology and keeping up with the current trend.

LBrands

Assoc Application Developer

▪Designed, developed and maintained Hippo Content Management System (CMS) a Java content repository API for maintaining victoriassecret.com.
▪Leveraged Java for creating software solutions to develop CMS to meet business needs and created new, customized out of the box components to make the application more efficient.
▪Made use of GIT for version control to maintain the code flow, achieved this by using SourceTree tool. ▪Worked with Senior Developers and Architects along the way to design and implement new features to the current application and regularly interacted with Commerce and Front-end teams for new design patterns and data flow.
▪ Regularly interacted with business partners to actively discuss new advancements and improvements to the current application.
▪Implemented and deployed few REST based services for automating the current workflow for better scalability.
▪Migrated important functions to Microservices using GoLang for handling and processing the product data to make the application more scalable and keep track of the performance for each service.
▪Used Apache Kafka tool for handling real-time streaming data from various sources, hence created and configured various consumers and producers for handling huge amount of data.
▪Used CouchDB for managing and storing the product information in JSON format for better processing and implementation. Used CouchDB to process the data in Kafka by creating and configuring the connection between the two.
▪Made use of developer management tools such as Confluence and Jira for better understanding of user requirements and interacting with them.
▪Created dashboards in Grafana for monitoring the services and performance of the application. Configured Kibana for logging all the activity related to application to easily track down production issues.
▪Closely worked with team members in an Agile methodology in two-week Sprint basis and attended daily Scrum meeting, brainstorming sessions and regular code reviews.

Presrite Corporation

Software Developer Intern

▪ Working closely with senior developers, architect and helping them in developing & executing complex design projects.
▪ Build and deployed artifacts using Jenkins jobs.
▪ Implemented functional logic by fetching the data from database and exposed processed data using Restful Web services as per the business requirements.
▪ Working on improvements & new features in an incremental roll out for proposed changes & end user A/B testing.
▪ Used Test Driven Development approach (TDD), created test suites using Junit and Selenium for unit testing and end-end functional testing respectively.
▪ Created Logstash log formatting files and Indexes for ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash & Kabana) stack and used it for monitoring production logs. Also created dashboards in Kabana for ease of separating functional business logs and infrastructure logs to derive metrics.
▪ Contributing to design and developments of UI using JavaScript along with Server side and Database components during my time here.
